info.title: iMatch OCR Microservice API
info.description: OpenAPI 3 Specification for the Extract OCR Microservice

post.description: Extract plain text from a provided document. The response is zipped and contains several different files explained below.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: List of languages used in the input document.

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: Ocr Profile only used for AbbyyCloud. Refer to the AbbyyCloud documentation for details.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Specifies if origin is a photograph taken with mobile phone. This skips ocr validations like DPI or noise, but will cause the license to be consumed even on low resolution or high noise documents.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource ID used for tracing only.

parameters.name: output_files
parameters.description: Filter for output files included in the result zip. If provided, the response zip will only include the files defined in this input. If not provided, all files will be included in the response.

requestBody.description: Customization parameters for the OCR process.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

post.description: Performs visual transformations to join tables that are side by side, removing the space between them by moving them withing the page, with the objective of make it easyer for the OCR process to analyze the structure of the document.

parameters.name: separate
parameters.description: Specifies whether to separate tables, removing them from the original page and adding a new page with them alone.

parameters.name: transformToImage
parameters.description: Enables image transformation for documents that are not an image. It is needed when providing a text pdf.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

post.description: Performs visual transformations to join tables that are side by side, extending the cell and column lines to overcome the space between them, with the objective of make it easyer for the OCR process to analyze the structure of the document.

parameters.name: transformToImage
parameters.description: Enables image transformation for documents that are not an image. It is needed when providing a text pdf.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

post.description: Performs image transformations to crop the margins of a document, leaving only the main body of the document. Useful for small scanned documents like ids.

parameters.name: transformToImage
parameters.description: Enables image transformation for documents that are not an image. It is needed when providing a text pdf.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

post.description: Process a pdf and transform it to image format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Select the output image format.
* PDF - the result will be a pdf with embedded images.
* TIFF - the result will be a tiff image with pages.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

200.description: The text was transformed to image successfully

get.description: Retrieves Abby license info including current consumption and limit.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

200.description: Abby license info was retrieved successfully

put.description: Initiates a process to restart Abbyy engines pool to avoid inconsistencies with abbyy licensing service.

401.description: You are not allowed to run this service

errorCode.description:
Error code. The error codes are formed with the following structure:
<service code>-<specific error code>
For example: 8002-404 means there was an error in pipeline executor (8002) caused by an resource manager not found (404)

additionalData.description: Additional information about the error. If no other information is explicitly provided, it may contain a stack trace.
additionalData.example: The resource manager returned a 503 error

minRatioToTextHeight.description: Defines the minimal acceptable height of the barcode in relation to the average letters height

codePage.description: Defines the minimal acceptable height of the barcode in relation to the average letters height

containsBinaryData.description: Defines the way binary data is represented in the recognized text

enableAdvancedExtractionMode.description: Defines if the advanced mode of barcode extraction is turned on for two-dimensional barcodes

hasChecksum.description: Specifies whether the barcode being recognized must be interpreted as the barcode of the same type but with a check sum

isCode39WithoutAsterisk.description: Specifies that the Code 39 barcode being recognized has no start and stop symbol, the asterisk "*"

BarcodeParams.description: Provides access to the subset of page processing parameters, affecting the process of barcode blocks recognition

apply.description: Defines whether to apply the Noise cleanser

threshold.description: Defines the threshold limit to apply the Noise cleanser

useOpenOfficeForDocx.description: Defines if using OpenOffice when converting Docx documents

performSynthesis.description: Specifies if document synthesis is to be performed

classifySeparators.description: Defines if additional properties of separators are detected during document synthesis

detectCaptions.description: Defines if the captions are detected during document synthesis

detectColumns.description: Defines if the columns are detected during document synthesis

detectFootnotes.description: Defines if the footnotes are detected during document synthesis

detectHeadlines.description: Defines if the headlines are detected during document synthesis

detectLists.description: Defines if the lists are detected during document synthesis

detectOverflowingParagraphs.description: Defines if the overflowing paragraphs are detected during document synthesis

detectRunningTitles.description: Defines if the running titles are detected during document synthesis

detectTableOfContents.description: Defines if the table of contents is detected during document synthesis

predefinedProfile.description: This method loads one of the predefined profiles

pageFlushingPolicy.description: The modes of working with document pages

detectBold.description: Defines if boldface is detected during synthesis

detectItalic.description: Defines if italic typeface is detected during synthesis

detectSubscriptsSuperscripts.description: Defines if subscript and superscript are detected during synthesis

detectUnderlineStrikeout.description: Defines if underline and strikeout are detected during synthesis

detectSmallCaps.description: Defines if small capital letters are detected during synthesis

detectDropCaps.description: Defines if drop capitals are detected during synthesis

detectFontFamily.description: Defines if font name is detected during synthesis

detectFontSize.description: Defines if font size is detected during synthesis

detectSerifs.description: Defines if serif is detected during synthesis

detectScaling.description: Defines if scaling is detected during synthesis

detectSpacing.description: Defines if spacing is detected during synthesis

monospaceDetectionMode.description: Defines the mode of monospace font detection

FontFormattingDetectionParams.description: Specifies additional parameters of font formatting detection at the stage of page synthesis

prohibitColorImage.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to use only black-and-white plane during objects extraction

sourceContentReuseMode.description: Specifies how to use the text and image layers of the source PDF file

removeGarbage.description: Specifies if garbage (excess dots that are smaller than a certain size) is to be removed from the image during objects extraction

removeTexture.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to remove the background noise from a temporary image used for recognition

detectMatrixPrinter.description: Specifies if the text printed on matrix printer is detected during objects extraction

detectPorousText.description: Specifies if the regions with porous text are detected during objects extraction

detectTextOnPictures.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to detect all text on an image, including text embedded into images

enableAggressiveTextExtraction.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to try to extract as much text on the image as possible

prohibitDottedSeparators.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to try to ignore dotted separators

ObjectsExtractionParams.description: Provides access to the subset of page processing parameters that affect extraction of objects

pdfTextToImage.description: This parameter enables PDF to TIFF or PDF_IMAGE conversion

pdfBoxTextExtraction.description: This parameter enables PDFBOX text extraction before ABBYY process

joinTables.description: This parameter enables joining tables horizontally that are aligned

rotateVerticalText.description: This parameter enables rotating vertical texts

extendTables.description: This parameter enables extending table lines to merge separate tables

processor.description: This parameter defines the OCR system to use

isEmail.description: This parameter will be evaluated for (in positive case) email extraction processing

cropMargins.description: This parameter enables cropping document margins

pdfboxStripper.description: This parameter defines the pdfbox text stripper with pdfBoxTextExtraction or FROM_TRANSFORMED_PDF strategy

textExtractionStrategy.description: This parameter sets the strategy to follow in order to extract the plain text after abbyy processing

dpiThreshold.description: This parameter sets the minimum document DPI to be accepted for processing

forceResize.description: This parameter enables resize of the document to the dpi threshold value

suspiciousThreshold.description: This parameter sets the maximum suspicious character ratio for a document to be processed

orientationDetectionMode.description: Specifies the mode of page orientation detection

prohibitClockwiseRotation.description: Disables clockwise page rotation when selecting the page orientation

prohibitCounterclockwiseRotation.description: Disables counterclockwise page rotation when selecting the page orientation

prohibitUpsidedownRotation.description: Disables upside-down page rotation when selecting the page orientation

OrientationDetectionParams.description: Provides access to the parameters of orientation detection

scenario.description: Specifies the scenario of export to PDF (PDF/A) format

textExportMode.description: Specifies the mode of export of recognized text into PDF (PDF/A) format

mrcMode.description: Specifies the mode of using Mixed Raster Content for output PDF (PDF/A) file

colority.description: Allows you to keep color of the output PDF (PDF/A) file or save it in gray or black-and- white

correctColorDepth.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to correct color depth of the document

resolution.description: Specifies the picture resolution in dpi

resolutionType.description: Defines how to use the value of the picture resolution specified in the Resolution property

PDFExportParams.description: Parameters in ABBYY FineReader Engine for exporting the recognized text into PDF (PDF/A) format

detectText.description: Specifies if text areas are detected during layout analysis

enableTextExtractionMode.description: Specifies if text blocks can be located anywhere on the page

detectTables.description: Specifies if the tables are detected during layout analysis

aggressiveTableDetection.description: Specifies if FineReader Engine tries to find as many tables as possible on the page

detectBarcodes.description: Specifies whether barcodes are detected, and accordingly barcode blocks created, during layout analysis

detectSeparators.description: Specifies whether separators are detected during layout analysis

detectPictures.description: Specifies whether pictures are detected during layout analysis

detectVectorGraphics.description: Specifies whether vector pictures are detected during layout analysis

detectMultipleBusinessCards.description: Specifies whether a processing page can contain several business cards

noShadowsMode.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to presume that an image has no shadows from scanning

paperSizeDetectionMode.description: This property indicates if the whole preprocessed image can contain information for analysis

detectVerticalEuropeanText.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to look for vertically oriented text in no CJK languages

prohibitCJKColumns.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to ignore the possibility of vertical text for CJK languages

prohibitDoublePageMode.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to presume that an image is not a book double page

prohibitModelAnalysis.description: Tells FineReader Engine if model analysis for page layout should be performed

collectPdfExportData.description: Tells FineReader Engine to collect data for PDF export during layout analysis

PageAnalysisParams.description: Provides access to the subset of page processing parameters that affect the process of page analysis

correctInvertedImage.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to detect whether the image is inverted (white text against black background)

correctOrientation.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to rotate the image if orientation is not the one expected

correctShadowsAndHighlights.description: Modes in ABBYY FineReader Engine to correct shadows and highlights

correctSkew.description: Modes in ABBYY FineReader Engine to correct image skew during page preprocessing

items.description: Specifies the modes of skew correction

geometryCorrectionMode.description: Specifies whether geometrical distortions should be removed during page preprocessing

resolutionCorrectionMode.description: Specifies whether resolution of the image should be corrected during page preprocessing

PagePreProcessingParams.description: Provides access to the subset of page processing parameters that affect the process of page preprocessing

performPreprocessing.description: Specifies if page preprocessing is to be performed

prohibitColorObjectsAltProcessing.description: Specifies if color objects must be filtered out on the image before layout analysis and recognition

performAnalysis.description: Specifies if page analysis is to be performed

performRecognition.description: Specifies if recognition is to be performed

PageProcessingParams.description: Specifies the processing parameters for each page of the document

splitType.description: Specifies the type of the page split which should be performed

rotationTypeEnum.description: This property specifies the rotation angle to apply to the image during preparation

correctSkew.description: This property set to TRUE tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to correct skew during image preparation

items.description: List with the modes of skew correction

backgroundFillingColor.description: Specifies the color used for filling the areas which are added to the image after skew correction

invertImage.description: This property set to TRUE tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to invert colors of the prepared image

mirrorImage.description: This property set to TRUE tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to mirror the prepared image around its vertical axis

enhanceLocalContrast.description: Specifies whether the local contrast of the image should be increased

photoProcessingMode.description: Specifies whether the processing image should be treated as a photo

keepOriginalCoordinatesInfo.description: Specifies whether the information about pixel coordinates in the current modification state should be saved

autoOverwriteResolution.description: Specifies whether resolution of the prepared image should be automatically overwritten

overwriteResolution.description: Allows you to overwrite resolution of the prepared image

getxResolutionToOverwrite.description: Specifies the horizontal resolution of the original image in dpi

getyResolutionToOverwrite.description: Specifies the vertical resolution of the original image in dpi

discardColorImage.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to leave only black-and-white plane in the prepared image

useFastBinarization.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine will use algorithms for fast image binarization

imageCompression.description: How an image should be compressed during conversion to the internal format

createPreview.description: Tells ABBYY FineReader Engine to create preview page for the prepared imag

previewHeight.description: Specifies the height in pixels of the preview page

previewWidth.description: Specifies the width in pixels of the preview page

PrepareImageMode.description: Contains different attributes specifying how an image will be prepared during conversion to the internal format

items.description: List with the text types used for recognition

balancedMode.description: Defines if the recognition will run in balanced mode

fastMode.description: Defines if fast mode is enabled

lowResolutionMode.description: Specifies whether a text on an image with low resolution is recognized

oneLinePerBlock.description: Specifies whether a text will be recognized by one line per block

oneWordPerLine.description: Specifies whether a text will be recognized as one word per line

prohibitItalic.description: Specifies whether to recognize letters printed with italic-styled font

prohibitSubscript.description: Specifies whether to recognize subscript letters

prohibitSuperscript.description: Specifies whether to recognize superscript letters

prohibitHyphenation.description: Specifies whether to recognize hyphenation from line to line

prohibitInterblockHyphenation.description: Specifies whether to recognize hyphenation from block to block

caseRecognitionModeEnum.description: This property specifies the mode of letter case recognition

writingStyleEnum.description: Provides additional information about handprinted letters writing style

fieldMarkingTypeEnum.description: This property specifies the type of marking around letters

cellsCount.description: Specifies the number of character cells in the block

trainUserPatterns.description: Specifies whether user patterns should be trained during the recognition

useBuiltInPatterns.description: Specifies whether ABBYY FineReader Engine will use its own built-in patterns during the recognition

userPatternsFile.description: Contains the full path to a file of the user pattern used for recognition

errorHighlightLevel.description: Specifies the level at which the ICharParams::IsSuspicious property is set to TRUE for a recognized character

exactConfidenceCalculation.description: Specifies whether character and word confidence will be defined more accurately during the recognition

saveCharacterRegions.description: Specifies whether the exact characters regions (ICharParams::CharacterRegion) are saved

saveCharacterRecognitionVariants.description: Specifies whether the variants of characters recognition are saved

saveWordRecognitionVariants.description: Specifies whether the variants of recognition of a word are saved

RecognizerParams.description: Provides access to the subset of page processing parameters that affect the process of page recognition

apply.description: Defines whether to apply the Suggestions cleanser

threshold.description: Defines the threshold limit to apply the Suggestions cleanser

detectDocumentStructure.description: Specifies whether document structure detection should be performed while document synthesis

detectFontFormatting.description: Specifies whether font formatting detection should be performed while document synthesis

lowMemoryMode.description: Specifies whether low memory mode should be used during document synthesis

pagePoolSize.description: Specifies how many pages can be loaded by document synthesis simultaneously

paragraphExtractionModeEnum.description: Specifies the mode of paragraph extraction

detectDocumentLinks.description: Defines if document references (e.g. cross-references) are detected during page synthesis

detectHyperlinks.description: Defines if hyperlinks are detected during page synthesis

synthesizeBusinessCards.description: Defines if FineReader Engine tries to find business cards on the page during page synthesis

detectFontFormattingAtPageLevel.description: Defines if font parameters are detected at the stage of page synthesis

detectBackgroundColor.description: Defines if the background color is detected during page synthesis

allowGrayBackgroundColor.description: Defines if the gray color is detected for background

detectTextColor.description: Defines if the text color is detected during page synthesis

allowGrayTextColor.description: Defines if the gray color is detected for text

correctDynamicRange.description: Defines if image colors will be corrected by dynamic range

detectCellsInversion.description: Defines if the cells inversion is detected during table block analysis

detectCellsOrientation.description: Defines if the cells orientation is detected during table block analysis

singleLinePerCell.description: Defines if you only recognize tables with one line of text per each cell

splitOnlyBySeparators.description: Defines if you only recognize tables with no hidden separators

TableAnalysisParams.description: Provides access to the subset of page processing parameters that affect the process of table analysis

heavyNoiseReduction.description: Specify whether to enable heavy noise reduction mode

writeCharacterRecognitionVariants.description: Specifies if collections of variants of characters recognition are to be written in a file in XML format

writeCharAttributes.description: Specifies which character attributes are to be saved in a file in XML format

writeCharFormatting.description: Specifies if character formatting is to be saved in a file in XML format

writeNondeskewedCoordinates.description: Specifies if character coordinates saved in a file in XML format are on a non-deskewed image plane

writeParagraphStyles.description: Specifies whether parameters of paragraph and font styles should be written in a file in XML format

writeWordRecognitionVariants.description: Specifies if collections of variants of words recognition are to be written in a file in XML format

XMLExportParams.description: Tuning parameters for recognized text export in XML format

ocrProcess.description:
OCR Process Type. Represents the engine used for text extraction:
* TEXT - the input was plain text so no OCR was needed.
* PDFBOXEXTRACTOR - text extracted form text PDF using pdfbox.
* ABBYY - text extracted using either ABBYY Cloud o ABBYY Finreader.
* TESSERACT - text extracted using tesseract engine.
* COMBINED - the provided document was extracted using a combination of processes.

pageCount.description: Number o pages from the original document.

mobile.description: Defines whether is from mobile origin

extractedText.txt.description: Actual plain text extracted from the document.

hOcr.xml.description: Structure XML obtained when processing with tesseract. It contains the structure elements of the document with their location.

transformed.pdf.description: PDF file with the visual transformations conducted before the actual OCR text recognition.

ocr.xml.description: Structure XML obtained when processing with ABBYY or direct text pdf extraction.

ZipRecognitionResults.description: ZIP file with all the files obtained from the OCR processing. The files included in the zip can be filtered using the output_files input parameter

timeLimited.description: Specifies whether the license is time limited
